snippet.title: Sigma 50mm F1.4 DG HSM | A Lens
snippet.description: While it's not cheap, the Sigma 50mm f1.4 lens provides great value for the money.

snippet.title: Facebook accused of faking member endorsements
snippet.description: A new lawsuit alleges that the social network falsifies members' likes for its sponsored ads.

snippet.title: Why Facebook is suddenly smitten with Groups
snippet.description: Now that half a billion people self-identify with groups, the social network is getting serious about its intentions for this oft-forgotten product.

snippet.title: Twitter names first female board member
snippet.description: Twitter hopes appointing former Pearson CEO Marjorie Scardino to its board will put some angry Tweeters to rest -- at least for awhile.

snippet.title: Sheryl Sandberg is Facebook's first female board member
snippet.description: A matter of weeks after Facebook's initial public offering, COO Sandberg joins the social network's board of directors.

snippet.title: Uber picks up PayPal to drive member numbers
snippet.description: PayPal's network could come in handy where credit cards are rare or other payment systems are unreliable -- and thus help Uber in its quest for global expansion.

snippet.title: LG Envoy II (U.S. Cellular)
snippet.description: With its low-end specs and mediocre camera, the Envoy II isn't worth buying -- especially since the Samsung Chrono 2 comes in at a cheaper contract price.

snippet.title: Facebook publicizes government requests for member data
snippet.description: The social network fielded requests for data on more than 38,000 members in the first half of the year, but no country was as data hungry as the US.

snippet.title: Hisense Sero 7 LT
snippet.description: The Hisense Sero 7 LT isn't worth your money -- skip it and go for its more robust counterpart, the Pro, instead.

snippet.title: LinkedIn member base climbs almost 40 percent in year
snippet.description: New mobile strategies emphasizing content and mobile apps appear to working. The professional social network is now 259 million members strong.
